channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.20
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.20 Release Notes

üé® UI/UX Improvements

Streamlined Settings - Reduced from 9+ tabs to just 5 focused sections. Everything is now exactly where you‚Äôd expect it to be, making configuration faster and more intuitive.

Visual Processing Indicators - New animated badges and status chips show exactly what‚Äôs happening with your files. Color-coded mode indicators make it clear whether you‚Äôre using Smart Rename or Template processing.

Cleaner, More Professional Look - Every element has been refined with a modern design system. The interface feels more polished and consistent throughout.

Better Information Architecture - Completely reorganized how features are presented. The app now guides you naturally from selecting files to choosing processing methods to seeing results.

‚ö° Performance & Reliability

More Reliable AI Processing - If one AI service is down, NameQuick automatically switches to another. Temporary glitches are handled gracefully with smart retries.

Improved Large File Handling - Smart sampling technology processes large documents more efficiently while maintaining accuracy.

üîß Under the Hood

Faster and More Responsive - Rebuilt with modern Swift concurrency for better performance. File processing is noticeably snappier.

Rock-Solid Stability - Extensive testing ensures this release is our most reliable yet. We‚Äôve squashed numerous edge-case bugs.

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed missing processing indicators on file thumbnails
  • Resolved settings navigation issues that made some options hard to find
  • Fixed license unlinking functionality now accessible from Settings > About
  • Corrected API integration issues causing authentication failures
  • Fixed file permissions not being properly respected during processing
  • Resolved memory leaks during batch processing operations

üìù Notes

This is a major architectural update that sets the foundation for exciting features coming in 2025. While maintaining full compatibility with existing workflows, we‚Äôve made NameQuick more reliable, more intuitive, and ready for the future.

Important for existing users: Your settings and templates are preserved, though you may notice they‚Äôve been reorganized for better clarity. All your existing licenses and API keys continue to work exactly as before.
